understanding.feature_description: A comprehensive test management system for tracking test cases
understanding.business_impact: Improves quality assurance and testing efficiency

contracts_to_create.purpose: Define test case structure and validation
contracts_to_create.zod_schema_preview: z.object({ id: z.string().uuid(), name: z.string(), status: z.enum([...]) })

acceptance_criteria: Test cases can be created with proper validation
Test case status can be updated through workflow
All data is type-safe with runtime validation

self_critique.how_will_prevent_prop_drift: Using exact<T>() pattern for all component props
self_critique.how_will_ensure_type_safety: Zod schemas for runtime validation, TypeScript strict mode
self_critique.fallback_plan_if_tests_fail: Implement minimal viable version first, then enhance

commitment.claude_signature: I commit to following contract-first development and will not implement without proper contracts and failing tests. Signed: Claude Test
